function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of consideration for directionality of respiratory events in layout design","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease transmission within classrooms and offices","Mitigation":"Consideration of respiratory event directionality in layout design, such as desk placement","Technologies":"Spatial analysis and simulation tools for layout design","People":"Occupants of classrooms and offices","Owner":"Architects, facility managers"},{"Description":"Inaccurate social distancing recommendations based on assumptions about droplet behavior","Impact":"Potential inadequate protection from droplet and aerosol transmission","Mitigation":"Conduct further research to identify appropriate social distancing distances based on factors influencing droplet and aerosol behavior","Technologies":"Data modeling and simulation for droplet and aerosol transmission","People":"Public health professionals, researchers","Owner":"Public health organizations, research institutions"},{"Description":"Insufficient emphasis on ventilation and air quality in reducing airborne transmission","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne transmission in poorly ventilated spaces","Mitigation":"Implementation of good ventilation systems and air purification measures","Technologies":"Air quality sensors, ventilation system design","People":"Occupants of poorly ventilated spaces","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers"}]}
